body.p: This subpart provides policies and establishes responsibilities for recording and maintaining contractor performance information. This subpart does not apply to procedures used by agencies in determining fees under award or incentive fee contracts. See subpart 16.4. However, the fee amount paid to contractors should be reflective of the contractorâ€™s performance and the past performance evaluation should closely parallel and be consistent with the fee determinations.
